title: Andrew Ballot
text:
Andrew Ballot (born 27 May 1971) is a South African former <a href="rugby%20league">rugby league</a> footballer who represented <a href="South%20Africa%20national%20rugby%20league%20team">South Africa</a> at the <a href="1995%20Rugby%20League%20World%20Cup">1995 World Cup</a>.
Playing career.
Ballot played club football for <a href="Doncaster%20R.L.F.C.">Doncaster Dragons</a>, <a href="Batley%20Bulldogs">Batley Bulldogs</a> and <a href="Hunslet%20R.L.F.C.">Hunslet Hawks</a>.
He played in all three matches for <a href="South%20Africa%20national%20rugby%20league%20team">South Africa</a> at the <a href="1995%20Rugby%20League%20World%20Cup">1995 World Cup</a>. In 1997 he played in a test match against <a href="France%20national%20rugby%20league%20team">France</a>, and in the <a href="Super%20League%20World%20Nines">Super League World Nines</a>.
